mapper.select:
SELECT s.stable_id AS sampleId, sv.site1_entrez_gene_id AS site1EntrezGeneId, g1.hugo_gene_symbol AS site1HugoSymbol, sv.site1_ensembl_transcript_id AS site1EnsemblTranscriptId, sv.site1_chromosome AS site1Chromosome, sv.site1_region AS site1Region, sv.site1_region_number AS site1RegionNumber, sv.site1_contig AS site1Contig, sv.site1_position AS site1Position, sv.site1_description AS site1Description, sv.site2_entrez_gene_id AS site2EntrezGeneId, g2.hugo_gene_symbol AS site2HugoSymbol, sv.site2_ensembl_transcript_id AS site2EnsemblTranscriptId, sv.site2_chromosome AS site2Chromosome, sv.site2_region AS site2Region, sv.site2_region_number AS site2RegionNumber, sv.site2_contig AS site2Contig, sv.site2_position AS site2Position, sv.site2_description AS site2Description, sv.site2_effect_on_frame AS site2EffectOnFrame, sv.ncbi_build AS ncbiBuild, sv.dna_support AS dnaSupport, sv.rna_support AS rnaSupport, sv.normal_read_count AS normalReadCount, sv.tumor_read_count AS tumorReadCount, sv.normal_variant_count AS normalVariantCount, sv.tumor_variant_count AS tumorVariantCount, sv.normal_paired_end_read_count AS normalPairedEndReadCount, sv.tumor_paired_end_read_count AS tumorPairedEndReadCount, sv.normal_split_read_count AS normalSplitReadCount, sv.tumor_split_read_count AS tumorSplitReadCount, sv.annotation AS annotation, sv.breakpoint_type AS breakpointType, sv.connection_type AS connectionType, sv.event_info AS eventInfo, sv.class AS structuralVariantClass, sv.length AS length, sv.comments AS comments, sv.sv_status AS svStatus FROM structural_variant sv JOIN genetic_profile gp ON gp.genetic_profile_id = sv.genetic_profile_id JOIN sample s ON s.internal_id = sv.sample_id LEFT JOIN gene g1 ON g1.entrez_gene_id = sv.site1_entrez_gene_id LEFT JOIN gene g2 ON g2.entrez_gene_id = sv.site2_entrez_gene_id WHERE gp.stable_id = #{molecularProfileStableId}
AND s.stable_id IN (#{sampleIdsArray, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.ArrayTypeHandler})
